000.name: MonsterCube
000.text: Can be used to catch monster

002.name: BestCube
002.text: The best for catching rare monster

020.name: Revive
020.text: revives a monster with 50% of its hp

021.name: Rebirth
021.text: revives a monster with full hp and removes aligments

030.name: ElementalCrystal
030.text: Water mixed with plants and fire under 300 bar pressure. Evolves the monster the guy at the start gave you (who could really need a tip)

031.name: WaterCrystal
031.text: Unmoving water that isnt frozen, how water monsters use it is still unclear

032.name: PlantCrystal
032.text: The essence of all plants, a good fertilizer that some plant monsters really need.

033.name: FireCrystal
033.text: Some monsters evolve after eating it
